## Description {#details}

Data Dependency Graph Edge.

An edge in the DDG can represent a def-use relationship or a memory dependence based on the result of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dependenceanalysis">DependenceAnalysis</a>. A rooted edge connects the root node to one of the components of the graph.

Definition at line 213 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/ddg-h">DDG.h</a>.
